name: The Yellow Flag
description:
This is a first person 3D level prototype for an exploration game (single player). Spatial layout is maze-like and the level is a navigation puzzle: players must explore to find the way through and reach the end goal.

In making this level, I tried to build an environment composed of different architectural techniques with the intent of trying out different building styles - from more classic ones to modern and futuristic.

Note: this is a protoype, thus bugs or minor issues may occur. Water is currently just a solid block: do not jump in it!
